briefdescription.para: Gets CLR types that are used as the content of HttpRequestMessage or HttpResponseMessage.
Gets the objects that are used directly as samples for certain actions.
Gets the objects that are serialized as samples by the supported formatters.
Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.

detaileddescription.para: Collection includes just ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(Type) initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0,func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of the HelpPageSampleGenerator class.
Gets the request body samples for a given ApiDescription.

simplesect.para: The samples keyed by media type.

briefdescription.para: Gets the response body samples for a given ApiDescription.

simplesect.para: The samples keyed by media type.

briefdescription.para: Gets the request or response body samples.

parameterdescription.para: The value indicating whether the sample is for a request or for a response.

simplesect.para: The samples keyed by media type.

memberdef.argsstring: (string controllerName, string actionName, IEnumerable< string > parameterNames, Type type, MediaTypeFormatter formatter, MediaTypeHeaderValue mediaType, SampleDirection sampleDirection)
memberdef.name: GetActionSample

briefdescription.para: Search for samples that are provided directly through ActionSamples.

parameterdescription.para: The value indicating whether the sample is for a request or for a response.

simplesect.para: The sample that matches the parameters.

briefdescription.para: Gets the sample object that will be serialized by the formatters. First, it will look at the SampleObjects. If no sample object is found, it will try to create one using DefaultSampleObjectFactory (which wraps an ObjectGenerator) and other factories in SampleObjectFactories.
Resolves the actual type of System.Net.Http.ObjectContent<T> passed to the System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage in an action.

memberdef.argsstring: (ApiDescription api, string controllerName, string actionName, IEnumerable< string > parameterNames, SampleDirection sampleDirection, out Collection< MediaTypeFormatter > formatters)
memberdef.name: ResolveType

briefdescription.para: Resolves the type of the action parameter or return value when HttpRequestMessage or HttpResponseMessage is used.

parameterdescription.para: The value indicating whether the sample is for a request or a response.

memberdef.argsstring: (MediaTypeFormatter formatter, object value, Type type, MediaTypeHeaderValue mediaType)
memberdef.name: WriteSampleObjectUsingFormatter

briefdescription.para: Writes the sample object using formatter.

memberdef.argsstring: (string controllerName, string actionName, IEnumerable< string > parameterNames, SampleDirection sampleDirection)
memberdef.name: GetAllActionSamples

briefdescription.para: This class will generate the samples for the help page.
